about.title: About me
about.technologies_desc: Some of the Technologies I have experience with

paragraphs.first: With over 12 years of experience in design, I've worked across diverse fields including media, banking and finance, insurance, and retail. I specialize in user interface and user experience design for mobile and web applications, with expertise in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React, and design tools including Sketch, Photoshop, After Effects, InDesign, and Final Cut Pro. Currently, I'm exploring AI and its influence on design practices.
paragraphs.second: I've both participated in and led design and development teams. Within Product Design, I've conducted extensive user research to build comprehensive frameworks that illuminate genuine user needs and desires. This approach enables me to craft engaging user experiences that significantly enhance how people interact with designed products.
paragraphs.third: My long-term professional goals include continuing to grow in my career and developing innovative projects that contribute to improving people's lives through thoughtful design.

web_design.title: Web Design

Each design prioritizes user needs while supporting key business objectives through thoughtful information architecture and responsive layouts.

flow.title: User Flow & Wireframing

visual.title: Visual Design
visual.description: I leverage the power of color, typography, imagery, and visual hierarchy to create cohesive, emotionally resonant digital experiences. My visual design approach balances aesthetic appeal with functional clarity to reinforce brand identity while enhancing usability across all touchpoints.

mobile.title: Mobile App Design
mobile.description: I design mobile experiences that combine intuitive interaction patterns with compelling visual treatments to create memorable, effective applications. My approach considers the specific constraints and opportunities of each device to deliver experiences that feel natural, responsive, and delightful on smaller screens.

ux_ui.title: UX & UI Design
ux_ui.description: Through user research, wireframing, prototyping, and strategic testing, I create coherent digital experiences that resonate with users on both practical and emotional levels. My approach balances business objectives with user needs to deliver solutions that feel intuitive, meaningful, and delightful to use.

nomadix.title: Nomadix Adventure

The Nomadix Adventure platform balances visual appeal with intuitive navigation to create an engaging, user-focused solution that exceeds expectations.

nomadix.title: Digital Transformation: Nomadix Adventure Ocean to Ocean

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: Nomadix Adventure needed a digital presence that would capture the essence of their flagship event 'Ocean to Ocean' - a bicycle journey across Baja California. They required a website that would not only inform but inspire adventurers to join this transformative journey.
challenge.quote: We wanted a site that would make cyclists' hearts beat as fast as when they're standing on a mountain summit.

discovery.title: Discovery & Inspiration
discovery.description: I began by immersing myself in the world of adventure cycling, understanding the emotional motivations behind those who challenge themselves in unfamiliar terrain.

participants.quote: Finally a site that makes me feel like I'm already on the route, with all the information I need to prepare properly.

impact.title: The Real Impact of My Work
impact.description: Beyond metrics, my design transformed how Nomadix Adventure connects with their community. Every element of the site invites visitors to take the first step in their own transformative adventure.
impact.conclusion: The site doesn't just provide information - it creates a digital experience that inspires action and builds trust through user-centered design focused on emotions.

leadership.title:
I've led cross-functional
design teams

By integrating user research into our process, I help teams create products that not only meet technical requirements but genuinely enhance how people interact with technology. This collaborative approach results in more efficient workflows and ultimately delivers more impactful digital experiences.

innovation.title: I'm passionate about innovation and continuous growth
innovation.description: My ongoing exploration of artificial intelligence and its influence on design reflects my commitment to staying at the forefront of our rapidly evolving field. I'm driven by the goal of developing innovative solutions that significantly improve people's lives through thoughtful design. This passion for creating positive impact through my work fuels my continuous professional development and creative problem-solving approach.
